vernac_cmds: Lemma Qpower_positive_1 : forall n, Qpower_positive 1 n == 1.
induction n; simpl; try rewrite IHn; reflexivity.
intros [|n|n]; simpl; try rewrite Qpower_positive_1; reflexivity.
Lemma Qpower_positive_0 : forall n, Qpower_positive 0 n == 0.
induction n; simpl; try rewrite IHn; reflexivity.
intros [|n|n] Hn; try (elim Hn; reflexivity); simpl; rewrite Qpower_positive_0; reflexivity.
Lemma Qpower_not_0_positive : forall a n, ~a==0 -> ~Qpower_positive a n == 0.
induction n; simpl in *; try assumption; destruct (Qmult_integral _ _ H); try destruct (Qmult_integral _ _ H0); auto.
Lemma Qpower_pos_positive : forall p n, 0 <= p -> 0 <= Qpower_positive p n.
induction n; simpl; repeat apply Qmult_le_0_compat;assumption.
Lemma Qpower_pos : forall p n, 0 <= p -> 0 <= p^n.
intros p [|n|n] Hp; simpl; try discriminate; try apply Qinv_le_0_compat; apply Qpower_pos_positive; assumption.
Lemma Qmult_power_positive : forall a b n, Qpower_positive (a*b) n == (Qpower_positive a n)*(Qpower_positive b n).
induction n; simpl; repeat rewrite IHn; ring.
Lemma Qmult_power : forall a b n, (a*b)^n == a^n*b^n.
intros a b [|n|n]; simpl; try rewrite Qmult_power_positive; try rewrite Qinv_mult_distr; reflexivity.
Lemma Qinv_power_positive : forall a n, Qpower_positive (/a) n == /(Qpower_positive a n).
induction n; simpl; repeat (rewrite IHn || rewrite Qinv_mult_distr); reflexivity.
intros a [|n|n]; simpl; try rewrite Qinv_power_positive; reflexivity.
Lemma Qdiv_power : forall a b n, (a/b)^n == (a^n/b^n).
Lemma Qinv_power_n : forall n p, (1#p)^n == /(inject_Z (Zpos p))^n.
Lemma Qpower_plus_positive : forall a n m, Qpower_positive a (n+m) == (Qpower_positive a n)*(Qpower_positive a m).
Lemma Qpower_opp : forall a n, a^(-n) == /a^n.
Lemma Qpower_minus_positive : forall a (n m:positive), (m < n)%positive -> Qpower_positive a (n-m)%positive == (Qpower_positive a n)/(Qpower_positive a m).
rewrite <- (Qdiv_mult_l (Qpower_positive a (n - m)) (Qpower_positive a m)) by (now apply Qpower_not_0_positive).
Lemma Qpower_plus : forall a n m, ~a==0 -> a^(n+m) == a^n*a^m.

intros a [|n|n] [|m|m] H; simpl; try ring; try rewrite Qpower_plus_positive; try apply Qinv_mult_distr; try reflexivity; rewrite ?Z.pos_sub_spec; case Pos.compare_spec; intros H0; simpl; subst; try rewrite Qpower_minus_positive; try (field; try split; apply Qpower_not_0_positive); assumption.
Lemma Qpower_plus' : forall a n m, (n+m <> 0)%Z -> a^(n+m) == a^n*a^m.
destruct n; destruct m; try (elim H; reflexivity); simpl; repeat rewrite Qpower_positive_0; ring_simplify; reflexivity.
Lemma Qpower_mult_positive : forall a n m, Qpower_positive a (n*m) == Qpower_positive (Qpower_positive a n) m.
Lemma Qpower_mult : forall a n m, a^(n*m) == (a^n)^m.
intros a [|n|n] [|m|m]; simpl; try rewrite Qpower_positive_1; try rewrite Qpower_mult_positive; try rewrite Qinv_power_positive; try rewrite Qinv_involutive; try reflexivity.
Lemma Zpower_Qpower : forall (a n:Z), (0<=n)%Z -> inject_Z (a^n) == (inject_Z a)^n.
rewrite Zpower_exp; auto with *; try discriminate.
replace (a^Zpos n*a^1)%Z with (a^Zpos n*a)%Z by ring.
setoid_replace (0+ - a) with (-a) in A by ring.
Theorem Qpower_decomp p x y : Qpower_positive (x#y) p = x ^ Zpos p # (y ^ p).
induction p; intros; simpl Qpower_positive; rewrite ?IHp.

command: induction n; simpl; try rewrite IHn; reflexivity.
intros [|n|n]; simpl; try rewrite Qpower_positive_1; reflexivity.
induction n; simpl; try rewrite IHn; reflexivity.
intros [|n|n] Hn; try (elim Hn; reflexivity); simpl; rewrite Qpower_positive_0; reflexivity.
induction n; simpl in *; try assumption; destruct (Qmult_integral _ _ H); try destruct (Qmult_integral _ _ H0); auto.
induction n; simpl; repeat apply Qmult_le_0_compat;assumption.
intros p [|n|n] Hp; simpl; try discriminate; try apply Qinv_le_0_compat; apply Qpower_pos_positive; assumption.
induction n; simpl; repeat rewrite IHn; ring.
intros a b [|n|n]; simpl; try rewrite Qmult_power_positive; try rewrite Qinv_mult_distr; reflexivity.
induction n; simpl; repeat (rewrite IHn || rewrite Qinv_mult_distr); reflexivity.
intros a [|n|n]; simpl; try rewrite Qinv_power_positive; reflexivity.
rewrite <- (Qdiv_mult_l (Qpower_positive a (n - m)) (Qpower_positive a m)) by (now apply Qpower_not_0_positive).

intros a [|n|n] [|m|m] H; simpl; try ring; try rewrite Qpower_plus_positive; try apply Qinv_mult_distr; try reflexivity; rewrite ?Z.pos_sub_spec; case Pos.compare_spec; intros H0; simpl; subst; try rewrite Qpower_minus_positive; try (field; try split; apply Qpower_not_0_positive); assumption.
destruct n; destruct m; try (elim H; reflexivity); simpl; repeat rewrite Qpower_positive_0; ring_simplify; reflexivity.
intros a [|n|n] [|m|m]; simpl; try rewrite Qpower_positive_1; try rewrite Qpower_mult_positive; try rewrite Qinv_power_positive; try rewrite Qinv_involutive; try reflexivity.
rewrite Zpower_exp; auto with *; try discriminate.
replace (a^Zpos n*a^1)%Z with (a^Zpos n*a)%Z by ring.
setoid_replace (0+ - a) with (-a) in A by ring.
induction p; intros; simpl Qpower_positive; rewrite ?IHp.
